Package eu.fbk.st.server.profile

Class ProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.st.server.profile.ProfileController
  • public class ProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Controller for what is related to users' profiles: retrieval and updates

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static spark.Route handleGetUserData
      GET | This serves the profile requested page Parameters: "username" (optional) the name of the user the client wants to get the profile of Note: this method forces that the authenticated user if the same of the ID in the GET request.
      static spark.Route handleUpdateProfileRequest
      PATCH | This serves a request of profile update Parameters: "username" the name of the user the client wants to edit the profile of "username" the name of the user the client wants to edit the profile of Note: this method forces that the authenticated user if the same of the ID in the request.
      static spark.Route serveIndexPage
      This redirects to the index page if there is a user in the session (if any, otherwise redirects to login page)

    • Field Detail

      • serveIndexPage

        public static spark.Route serveIndexPage
        This redirects to the index page if there is a user in the session (if any, otherwise redirects to login page)

      • handleGetUserData

        public static spark.Route handleGetUserData
        GET | This serves the profile requested page Parameters: "username" (optional) the name of the user the client wants to get the profile of Note: this method forces that the authenticated user if the same of the ID in the GET request. If the user is the admin, instead, the profile is returned anyway

      • handleUpdateProfileRequest

        public static spark.Route handleUpdateProfileRequest
        PATCH | This serves a request of profile update Parameters: "username" the name of the user the client wants to edit the profile of "username" the name of the user the client wants to edit the profile of Note: this method forces that the authenticated user if the same of the ID in the request. If the user is the admin, instead, the profile is edited anyway
